reviewtext: This is a great item.  I tried three different 'soft' cases and always had a problem with the Palm coming on and beeping while it was in my pocket.  Give this baby FIVE STARS!The critism is WRONG.  A.  Can't use left  handed?  Sure you can.  Just put it in the left side!B.  Can't synch  while in the case?  You bet you can.  Just tilt the stand to the side.  No  problem.
